predicate.note: Frames file for 'exchange' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'trade' etc.

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium, traded for or at

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Heritage, which owns 51% of POP's 3.6 million shares outstanding, said it will exchange one share of a new preferred stock for each POP common share it doesn't already own.
example.arg: one share of a new preferred stock
each POP common share it doesn't already own

example.name: with other exchanger
example.text: John exchanged nasty glances with Mary.
